title: the Lightning Champion
intro: When the Primordial Dragon fell, its soul was shattered into six fragments of avatars that would later be referred to as the Dragon Knights, or the Draconis siblings. Artorias is the youngest sibling, wielding the elemental power of thunder. He loves to travel around the world and wrecking havoc everywhere, which cause a lot of headache to his older siblings.

abilities.name: Thunder Fury
abilities.details:
Every time Artorias basic attacks or uses Lightning Strike on an enemy hero, he receives a stack of Thunder Fury that boosts attack speed (maximum five stacks).

At maximum stacks, Artorias's basic attack or Lightning Strike creates lightning and deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power) to the target and nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Lightning Strike
abilities.details:
Artorias thrusts his spear forward in a target direction, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit.

In Thunder Dragon form, Artorias fires a blast of lightning in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies hit.

abilities.name: Voltaic Body
abilities.details:
Artorias gains increased movement speed that decays over a short duration. Using this ability will remove all movement speed slow debuffs currently on him.

In Thunder Dragon form, Artorias flies up and gains the ability to go over terrains. Using the ability again to land down, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in a radius and knocking them back.

abilities.name: Galvanic Spear
abilities.details:
Artorias leaps to a target and thrusts his spear, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) and slowing the target for a short duration.

In Thunder Dragon form, Artorias sweeps its tail in a cone-shaped area, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies hit and slowing them down for a short duration.

abilities.name: Storm Breaker
abilities.details:
Artorias transforms into the powerful Thunder Dragon, gaining increased size, movement speed and maximum stacks of Thunder Fury for a duration.

While in Thunder Dragon form, Artorias's attack speed will be converted to bonus magical power and his basic attacks fire a long range lightning bolt instead.

Artorias also switches to a separate abilities set during this time.
